title: Understanding the PMT Function
text: The PMT function is used in financial calculations to determine the payment for a loan based on constant payments and a constant interest rate.

title: Components of the PMT Function
text: The PMT function typically requires the interest rate, number of periods, and the present value of the loan as its parameters.

title: Identifying the Correct PMT Function
text: Which of the following represents the correct syntax for the PMT function?
